name: Astro Lords: Quick Start
detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

Accelerate your development in the game with the new "Quick Start" offer

DLC "Quick Start" includes: [/]
  • Science artifact [/] "Memory module" bronze - science generation + 60% [/]
  • Rune of production [/] "Tiirs" golden - Speed ​​of construction and improvement of buildings on the asteroid + 50% [/]
  • Officer warrior [/] "Alexander Onisimov" 3 ranks - Amount of experience gained for Captains + 20% [/]
  • Auto-equipment [/] premium service for 1 month - Automatic equipment with ammunition [/] [/]

    How to use the DLC: [/]
    • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
    • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, just select it and press the button: Collect the reward [/]
    • Enjoy your DLC! [/]

      Attention, important! [/]
      In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.

short_description: DLC "Quick Start" for the MMO game "Astro Lords"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP/Vista 7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 256 Mb and higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: X 10.6.8
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 256 Mb or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 256Mb and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
